Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.tui.input.setup

package it.polimi.ingsw.view.tui.input.setup
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    it.polimi.ingsw.view.tui.input
     
    it.polimi.ingsw.view.tui.input.chatinput
     
    it.polimi.ingsw.view.tui.input.draginput
     
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AskAddress
    The AskAddress class represents an input prompt for asking the user to insert a server address in order to create a connection to the server.
    AskCreateOrJoin
    The AskCreateOrJoin class represents an input prompt for asking the user to choose between creating a new game, joining an existing game, or rejoining a game after a disconnection.
    AskNickname
    The AskNickname class represents the welcome page of the TUI and is an input prompt for asking the user to enter a unique nickname.
    AskPlayersNumber
    The AskPlayersNumber class represents an input prompt for choosing the number of players in the game when the player is creating a new game.
    AskPort
    The AskPort class represents an input prompt for entering a port in order to create a connection to the server.
    AskProtocol
    The AskProtocol class represents an input prompt for choosing a connection protocol between socket and RMI.
    AskWait
    The AskWait class represents an input prompt for waiting until the game begins (when there aren't enough players).
    AskWaitTillConnectionUp
    The AskWaitTillConnectionUp class represents an input prompt for waiting until the connection is up after a player's disconnection.
